location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant James Tronson, Commander of the HC Brig Euphrates, Bushire Harbour, to Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: James Tronson reports that the HC brig Euphrateshas arrived at Bushire from Bahrein [Bahrain]. Tronson states that nothing was known at Bahrein of the pirate, Saheil ben Ateish, further than what was stated in Tronson's letter of 29 January 1850. Tronson writes that it is supposed that the pirate will not show himself until the pearl fishing commences.
